org.apache.hadoop.registry.client.binding

类 RegistryPathUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.registry.client.binding.RegistryPathUtils

  • @InterfaceAudience.Private
 @InterfaceStability.Evolving
public class RegistryPathUtils
extends Object
    Basic operations on paths: manipulating them and creating and validating path elements.

      Return the username found in the ZK path.

    • 方法详细资料

      • validateZKPath

        public static String validateZKPath(String path)
                             throws InvalidPathnameException
        Validate ZK path with the path itself included in the exception text
        参数:
        path - path to validate
        返回:
        the path parameter
        抛出:
        InvalidPathnameException - if the pathname is invalid.

      • validateElementsAsDNS

        public static String validateElementsAsDNS(String path)
                                    throws InvalidPathnameException
        Validate ZK path as valid for a DNS hostname.
        参数:
        path - path to validate
        返回:
        the path parameter
        抛出:
        InvalidPathnameException - if the pathname is invalid.

      • createFullPath

        public static String createFullPath(String base,
                                    String path)
                             throws InvalidPathnameException
        Create a full path from the registry root and the supplied subdir
        参数:
        path - path of operation
        返回:
        an absolute path
        抛出:
        InvalidPathnameException - if the path is invalid

      • join

        public static String join(String base,
                          String path)
        Join two paths, guaranteeing that there will not be exactly one separator between the two, and exactly one at the front of the path. There will be no trailing "/" except for the special case that this is the root path
        参数:
        base - base path
        path - second path to add
        返回:
        a combined path.

      • split

        public static List<String> split(String path)
        split a path into elements, stripping empty elements
        参数:
        path - the path
        返回:
        the split path

      • lastPathEntry

        public static String lastPathEntry(String path)
        Get the last entry in a path; for an empty path returns "". The split logic is that of split(String)
        参数:
        path - path of operation
        返回:
        the last path entry or "" if none.

      • parentOf

        public static String parentOf(String path)
                       throws org.apache.hadoop.fs.PathNotFoundException
        Get the parent of a path
        参数:
        path - path to look at
        返回:
        the parent path
        抛出:
        org.apache.hadoop.fs.PathNotFoundException - if the path was at root.

      • encodeForRegistry

        public static String encodeForRegistry(String element)
        Perform any formatting for the registry needed to convert non-simple-DNS elements
        参数:
        element - element to encode
        返回:
        an encoded string

      • encodeYarnID

        public static String encodeYarnID(String yarnId)
        Perform whatever transforms are needed to get a YARN ID into a DNS-compatible name
        参数:
        yarnId - ID as string of YARN application, instance or container
        返回:
        a string suitable for use in registry paths.

      • getUsername

        public static String getUsername(String recPath)
        Return the username found in the ZK path.
        参数:
        recPath - the ZK recPath.
        返回:
        the user name.
